alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL LANCASTER COUNTY THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 716 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of New Holland, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Paradise, Gap, Atglen, Intercourse, Christiana, Georgetown and White Horse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
